è¿›è€Œ\(\ln L=\sum_{i=1}^{n}(\lnp_1^{y_i}(\hat{w}^{T},\hat{x})+\lnp_0^{1-y_i}(\hat{w}^{T},\hat{x}))=\sum_{i=1}^{n}(y_i\lnp_1(\hat{w}^{T},\hat{x})+(1-y_i)\lnp_0(\hat{w}^{T},\hat{x}))\)
